org.kohsuke.args4j.spi

Class AbstractGetter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kohsuke.args4j.spi.AbstractGetter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Getter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FieldGetter, MapGetter, MultiValueFieldGetter

    public abstract class AbstractGetter<T>
extends Object
implements Getter<T>
    An abstract Getter is of the type of the underlying bean and is not multivalued
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
